name: RABBIT HOLE
description: Anyone who is a constant web search knows what its like to go down a rabbit hole and finding yourself not being able to find your way back. This project is a web app with a simplistic design that allows users to save their search results and come back to them later.

name: Blue Kee Design Co.
description: The Blue Kee Design Co. website is a responsive React application built to showcase custom laser-cut products for weddings and events. It features a visually appealing design, interactive navigation, smooth scroll animations, and a detailed contact form with client inquiry validation. The site highlights product packages, integrates dynamic content rendering, and ensures a seamless experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

name: Devin Runowski
description: This project is my Software Engineering portfolio. It showcases my work and provides a way for potential employers to contact me.
